JobDescription: Research and develop cutting-edge AI models using Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Work on NLP and deep learning projects, publish papers, and collaborate with data scientists.
Analyze complex datasets using Python, SQL, and machine learning techniques. Build predictive models, design experiments, and communicate insights to stakeholders.
Design, develop, and maintain scalable software systems using Java, C++, React, and SQL. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features.
Monitor and secure networks and systems using cybersecurity best practices. Perform ethical hacking, vulnerability assessments, and respond to security incidents.
